channel.title: Downloadable Client
channel.description: Heyy Guys, i've recently made a server and i want my friends to play and i'm having trouble with the downloadable client. 1.) What do i delete first before giving out the link. (In the Source + Client) And 2.) What ip do i join to? Theres two in client.java and 2 in gui.java. Do i change both in the client.java and both in gui.java to my ip? please help

item.title: Downloadable Client
item.dc:creator: @rich1716 rich1716
item.description:
@rich1716 wrote:

Heyy Guys, i’ve recently made a server and i want my friends to play and i’m having trouble with the downloadable client. 1.) What do i delete first before giving out the link. (In the Source + Client) And 2.) What ip do i join to? Theres two in client.java and 2 in gui.java. Do i change both in the client.java and both in gui.java to my ip? please help
